name: Rebuffing Reduction
descriptionText: Your damage reduction can turn the force of blows back on your enemies.
benefitText: Whenever an opponent that is adjacent to you fails to penetrate your DR with a melee attack, you can spend an immediate action to attempt a bull rush combat maneuver against that opponent. If you succeed, you cannot move with the opponent.
normalText: A bull rush combat maneuver is a standard action.
